body: Hi Carmelo, Using Honeybee masses2zone instead of using **hb_EPZoneSurface did the trick and I could run your definition.** **[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/acpOyHjOGsh7A7qXdwOAxvN6ekCHvJBVGlw8fAvMjVPSYdQcETC1OHI*mjRZfy9OVaqns9vsNU-XvWKlkkkxgCvTCso*4vcv/Image.png)** **Definition attached.** **-Devang**
